Text.Page:
I've packed up the weapons you collected and the supplies you liberated. Not everything, of course. That would be too heavy, and I've kept some for Rasima and I.

Take them to Hendry and report on our progress. I want him to know that we're getting the job done out here.

New weapons, rations, and this report? You've been busy!

I'll send these on to Crescentia and make sure you both get the credit you deserve.
